description: Konami Group Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, primarily engages in the digital entertainment, amusement, gaming and systems, and sports businesses. The company's Digital Entertainment Business manufactures and sells amusement machines with arcade games, computer and video games, mobile games, and card games. Its Amusement Business engages in the design, production, and sale of amusement machines; and offers online game services. The company's Gaming & Systems Business develops, manufactures, distributes, and services gaming machines and casino management systems. Its Sports Business operates sports clubs and sports classes, including swimming, gymnastics, dance, soccer, tennis, and golf, as well as produces and sells sports related goods. It operates in Japan and other Asia/Oceania countries, the United States, and Europe. The company was formerly known as Konami Holdings Corporation and changed its name to Konami Group Corporation in July 2022. Konami Group Corporation was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
